00028 #ifndef SIMPLEWNTCELLCYCLEMODEL_HPP_
00029 #define SIMPLEWNTCELLCYCLEMODEL_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include "AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel.hpp"
00032 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00033 #include "WntConcentration.hpp"
00034 
00035 
00039 class SimpleWntCellCycleModel : public AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel
00040 {
00041 private:
00042 
00044     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00051     template<class Archive>
00052     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00053     {
00054         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel>(*this);
00055 
00056         RandomNumberGenerator *p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00057         archive & *p_gen;
00058 
00059         archive & mUseCellTypeDependentG1Duration;
00060         archive & mDimension;
00061     }
00062 
00067     bool mUseCellTypeDependentG1Duration;
00068 
00072     unsigned mDimension;
00073 
00077     double GetWntLevel();
00078 
00083     WntConcentrationType GetWntType();
00084 
00085 protected:
00086 
00096     void SetG1Duration();
00097 
00098 public:
00099 
00107     SimpleWntCellCycleModel(unsigned dimension, bool useCellTypeDependentG1Duration=false);
00108 
00112     void UpdateCellCyclePhase();
00113 
00117     void ResetForDivision();
00118 
00122     void InitialiseDaughterCell();
00123 
00128     AbstractCellCycleModel* CreateCellCycleModel();
00129 
00135     unsigned GetDimension();
00136 };
00137 
00138 // Declare identifier for the serializer
00139 BOOST_CLASS_EXPORT(SimpleWntCellCycleModel)

00154 }

00163 {
00171     unsigned dimension = UINT_MAX;
